name: Poor Man's Fly
description:
Update 3/25/2017 - new controls for lefties or righties. Packaged with the love0.10 engine for Windows users, now works directly from the itch.io client.

Explore planets! Fight pirates! participate in trade! And all for a lot less than, another game with a similar sounding name. Disclaimer, not all promised features may be available upon first release... or ever!
